ComponentSpec.Name: head
ComponentSpec.Spec: x.size ≥ 1 ∧ y.size = 1 ∧ x.max ≥ y.max ∧ x.min ≤ y.min ∧ y.first = x.first ∧ y.last = x.first

ComponentSpec.Name: last
ComponentSpec.Spec: x.size ≥ 1 ∧ y.size = 1 ∧ x.max ≥ y.max ∧ x.min ≤ y.min ∧ y.first = x.last ∧ y.last = x.last

ComponentSpec.Name: take
ComponentSpec.Spec: x1.size > y.size ∧ x1.max ≥ y.max ∧ x1.min ≤ y.min ∧ x2 > 0 ∧ x1.size > x2 ∧ x1.first = y.first

ComponentSpec.Name: drop
ComponentSpec.Spec: x1.size > y.size ∧ x1.max ≥ y.max ∧ x1.min ≤ y.min ∧ x2 > 0 ∧ x1.size > x2 ∧ x1.last = y.last

ComponentSpec.Name: minimum
ComponentSpec.Spec: x.size > 1 ∧ y.size = 1 ∧ x.max ≥ y.max ∧ y.min = x.min

ComponentSpec.Name: maximum
ComponentSpec.Spec: x.size > 1 ∧ y.size = 1 ∧ x.max = y.max ∧ y.min ≥ x.min

ComponentSpec.Name: reverse
ComponentSpec.Spec: y.size = x.size ∧ y.size > 1 ∧ x.size > 1 ∧ x.max = y.max ∧ x.min = y.min ∧ x.first = y.last ∧ x.last = y.first

ComponentSpec.Name: sort
ComponentSpec.Spec: y.size = x.size ∧ y.size > 1 ∧ x.size > 1 ∧ x.max = y.max ∧ x.min = y.min

ComponentSpec.Name: access
ComponentSpec.Spec: x1.size ≥ 1 ∧ y.size = 1 ∧ x1.max ≥ y.max ∧ x1.min ≤ y.min ∧ x2 > 0 ∧ x1.size > x2

ComponentSpec.Name: filter
ComponentSpec.Spec: x1.size > y.size ∧ y.max ≤ x1.max ∧ y.min ≥ x1.min

ComponentSpec.Name: identity
ComponentSpec.Spec: y.size = x.size ∧ y.first = x.first ∧ y.last = x.last ∧ y.max = x.max ∧ y.min = x.min
